flawed_nl_solution:
Donny saves a total of $15+$28+$13 = $<<15+28+13=56>>56 across all 3 days
He spends half of his total savings which is $56*(1/2) = $<<56*(1/2)=112/1>>112/1
#### 112/1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 112/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
